column2: and the line was almost out the door when we arrived (there were 5 of us
column3: and I'm glad that other customers were respectful of John's daughters- he had 2 at the time
column4: but 3 now). It didn't move very quickly
column5: and it always reached the door or beyond while we were there (we were inside for a good hour). Anyway
column6: it took us about 10 minutes to order.
